1.<pc>は 天使長の間に行くため|聖天舎の２階へ 向かった。: <pc> headed to the 2F of the|monastery to get to the Archangel's office.

2.「やあ。| 天使長に 呼びだされたのかい？: Hi. Did the Archangel call for you?

3.「キミは あいかわらず 頼りにされているね。| もっとも 頼れる相手が キミしか: As usual, you are being depended on. I'm sure|the current Archangel's true feelings are that|you are the only person he can rely on.

4.「四天の星巡りを達成して 神となる資格を得た| アストルティアの英雄たち……。: Heroes of the Heavens of Astoltia who have|achieved the Four Heavenly Trials and|qualified to become gods...

5.「だが 神化の儀は失敗し| 英雄たちは 悪神と化した。| ……私とキミの 二名を: But the ritual failed and the heroes became|fiends. Except for two... you and me.

6.「ふふっ。私が 儀式の場に| 姿を現さなかった 理由を知りたい……| そんな顔を: Hmmm. You look like you want to know why I|didn't show up for the ceremony.

7.「その答えは……いずれ わかるさ。| キミは キミのなすべきことを するといい。: The answer... you'll see. You do what you have|to do.

8.「そうだ。ここで 私と会ったことは| 内密にしておいてくれると 助かるよ。: Yes. I'd appreciate it if you wouldn't tell|anyone that you met me here.

10.「よく来てくれたね <pc>。| 察しているだろうが お前を呼びだしたのは| 神:
Welcome . As you may have|guessed, I summoned you because of a|development in the matter of one of the|
|deification ceremonies.

11.「我々がおこなった 神化の儀により| 英雄たちは 神ではなく 悪神と化した。: The deification rituals we performed turned|our heroes into fiends, not gods.

12.「お前のおかげで ラダ・ガートの魂だけは| 回収することができたが 他の悪神たち: Thanks to you, I was able to recover only|Fiend Lada Gart's soul, but all the other|fiends have gone...

13.「あれから 我々は| 悪神たちのゆくえを追うと共に 神化の儀の| 失敗の原因につ: Since then, we have been investigating the|cause of the failure of the deification|ceremony as well as the fate of the fiends.

14.「その過程で こいつを 見つけたのさ。: And in the process, I found this guy.

15.「神化の儀とは……四天の星巡りを突破し| 魂の燭台に すべての炎を灯らせた 英雄:
The Divination Ceremony is a rite of ascension|of a hero's soul to divine heights after|passing the Four Heavenly Trials and lighting|
|all the flames of the Soul Candle.

16.「英雄たちが 魂の燭台を 神化の光炉にささげ| そこから生まれた 神化の炎を お:
Heroes offer the Soul Candle to the furnace of|divinization, and by taking the flame of|divinization that is born from it into|
|themselves, they become gods.

17.「この ２つの黒い宝石は 神化の光炉から| 見つかったんだ。調べたところ こいつ:
These two black gems were found in the furnace|of divinity. Upon investigation, it was|discovered that a certain curse was placed on|
|these gems.

18.「おそらく 神化の儀を失敗させたい 何者かが| あらかじめ 神化の光炉に| この: Perhaps someone who wanted the ritual to fail|had planted this gem in the furnace in|advance.

19.「そして 英雄たちが 魂の燭台を| 光炉に投げ込んだ際に その呪いが発動し| 神: And when the heroes threw the Soul Candle into|the furnace, its curse was activated and the|flame of divinity was burned away...

20.「呪われし 神化の炎……呪炎を取り込んだ| 英雄たちは 悪神となってしまった。|: The cursed fire of divinity...the heroes who|took in the cursed fire became fiends. That|must be the reason for the incident.

21.「この宝石は 悪神の火種とでも 呼ぼうか。| 何事も わかりやすいのが イチバン: Let's call this gem Fiend's Flame. Ban,|everything is best when it's easy to|understand.

22.「……悪神の火種を使って 神化の儀を失敗させた| 犯人は まだ 見つかっていない: ...The culprit who used Fiend's Flame to foil|the deification ceremony has yet to be found.|We are investigating this matter.

23.「さて ここからが 本題なのだが……| じつは 最近 アストルティアの各地で|: Now, here's the thing... there have been some|unusual phenomena observed in various parts of|Astoltia recently.

24.「これらは 下界に降りた 悪神たちが| 引き起こしたものではないかと 考えている:
I believe that these are caused by the fiends|who have descended to the lower realms. If|left unchecked, they will bring great|
|misfortune.

25.「ただでさえ 強大な英雄たちが 悪神と化した。| 並の者では 太刀打ちできまい。: The mighty heroes have turned into fiends. No|ordinary man can stand against them. You are|the only one we can rely on now.

26.「<pc>。悪神たちの呪いを解き| 元の 誇り高き英雄に 戻してほしい。| 引き: <pc>. I want you to break the curse|of the fiends and return me to the proud hero|I once was. Will you undertake this task?<yesno><close>

27.「ふむ？ 断られた気がしたが……四天の星巡りを| 突破したほどの英雄が アストル:
Hmm? I had a feeling he'd said no, but...|there's no way a hero who's broken through the|Four Heavenly Trials would overlook a crisis|
|in Astoltia. I must have misheard.

28.「うん。さすがは 選ばれし英雄だ。| ぜひ お前のチカラを 貸しておくれ。: Yeah. As expected of the chosen hero. Please|lend me your strength.

29.「無論 お前ひとりに 押し付ける気はない。| 協力者として 天星郷の者も 同行さ: Of course, I don't want to impose on you|alone. As a collaborator, I'll have someone|from Heaven with me... come on in!

30.「アストルティアでの任務……| 私も 同行させていただきます。| よろしくお願い: Your mission in Astoltia...I will be|accompanying you. I look forward to working|with you <pc>.<yesno><close>

31.「なっ なぜです……はっ！？| もしや 私が誰か わからないのでしょうか。| 私: What? Why...ha! If you don't know who I am?|It's me! I don't have wings, but I am Yuliza.

32.「ふふっ。| 必ずや あなたの お役に立ってみせます！: I will surely be of service to you! I will|surely be of service to you!

33.「ユーライザは 翼を隠して 同行する。| 天使の実在を知らぬ アストルティアの民:
Yuliza will accompany him with her wings|hidden. She will not want to cause any|unnecessary surprise to the people of|
|Astoltia, who do not know that angels are|real.

34.「では 悪神への対処法を 説明しよう。| 神化の儀から 日が たってしまったせい:
Let me explain how to deal with fiends. Since|it has been a long time since the deification|ceremony, it seems that the evil curse is|
|still in progress.

35.「ラダ・ガートは 悪神となり 間もなかったから| 打ち倒すだけで 呪いが解けたの:
Fiend Lada Gart had only been a fiend for a|short time, so only a simple strike would have|broken the curse. It will no longer be like|
|that.

36.「だが 打つ手は ある。| ……ここにね。: But there is a way to beat it. ...right here.

39.「先に 悪神化の呪いの詳細を 説明しよう。| この呪いは 英雄たちの記憶や 心の:
First, let me explain the details of the Evil|God Curse. It is said that this curse|interferes with the memories and emotional|
|scars of our heroes, stirring up their anger|and Hatred.

40.「まずは 悪神の 荒ぶる心……怒りや憎悪を| 鎮めるんだ。その方法に これが正解: First of all, you have to calm the fiend's|raging heart of anger and hatred. There is no|right way to do it, but try to do it.

41.「怒りや憎悪が鎮まれば 悪神化の呪いは弱まる。| その時こそ お前に渡した| 神: When anger and hatred are appeased, the evil|curse will weaken. That is when the Divine|Sword Lectalis I gave you will come into play.

42.「呪いが弱体化した 悪神を| 神剣で斬りつければ 呪炎を切り離せる。| つまり:
The curse has been weakened. If you slash the|fiend with the divine sword, you can sever the|cursed flame. In other words, the curse is|
|completely lifted.

43.「とまあ いろいろ言ったが……とりあえずは| アストルティアで 異変を起こしてい: Well, I've said a lot of things, but for now,|we should find out where the fiends are that|are causing the anomalies in Astoltia.

44.「ドルワーム王国 風の町アズラン| そして ジュレットの町……この３か所で| 異: Dolworm Kingdom, Wind Town Azlan, and Julet|Town...I want you to start by investigating|the anomalies in these three places.

45.「どの場所から始めても 構わないからね。| では <pc> ユーライザ 頼んだよ: I don't care where you start. Now,|<pc> Yuliza, please do me a favor.

48.「ごめんなさい。私……長く留守にするというのに| 当然 しておくべきことを 忘れ: I'm sorry. I know I'm going to be gone for a|long time, but I forgot to do something that I|should have done.

49.「申し訳ありません <pc>。| アストルティアへ 出発する前に| 私の部屋に: I am sorry <pc>. Before you leave for|Astoltia, would you be so kind as to stop by|my room...?

50.「なぜ 天使長は 私たちを こんな場所に| 呼びだしたのでしょう…………: Why did the Archangel call us to this place...

51.「……ヘルヴェルお姉様！| どうして こちらに？: Sister Helvel! What are you doing here?

52.「天使長の命でな。お前たちが持ち帰った| 悪神の火種を 受け取りに来たのだ。: By order of the Archangel. I am here to|receive the Fiend's Flame that you have|brought back.

53.「強力な呪物ゆえ 暴発することも考えられる。| 受け取り次第 そのまま ひとけの: It is a powerful spell, and it could go off.|We have been instructed to destroy it in this|deserted area as soon as we receive it.

54.「なるほど そういうことでしたか。| 悪神の火種でしたら こちらに…………: I see. So that's how it is. If it's Fiend's|Flame, I'm here...

58.「……儀式のため 天の聖壇へ向かう途中で| 悪い予感がしたのでね。未来を予知して:
...as I was on my way to the Heaven Altar for|the ritual, I had a bad premonition. I tried|to foretell the future, but I saw nothing, as|
|if it were painted black.

59.「だから 儀式は受けず 様子を見ていただけさ。| ……そのせいで 天星郷の天使た: That's why I didn't take part in the ritual.|...although I guess that made the angels in|Heaven suspect that I was the culprit.

60.「英雄たちの悪神化と あなたは 無関係だという| その言葉を 信じたとして……|:
Even if I were to take your word that you had|nothing to do with the heroes' apotheosis...|what have you been doing out of sight all this|
|time?

61.「アストルティアで キミたちが| キミたちの なすべきことを していたように|: Just as you did what you had to do in|Astoltia, I will do what I have to do...

62.「天星郷を練り歩き 一連の事件についての| 真相を 探っていた。: He was parading around Heaven, trying to get|to the bottom of a series of incidents.

64.「<cs_pchero>が 天星郷に到着した直後に| 魂の燭台を 紛失したこと。:
The loss of the Soul Candle shortly after| arrived in Heaven. The God|Beast's transformation that took place in the|
|Deep Green Trials.

65.「みそぎをおこなう 浄罪の泉の 汚染。| 神代の遺構における 天使アルビデの 不:
The pollution of Pure Spring where the|purification ceremony is held. The suspicious|death of Angel Albide at the Ancient Remains.|
|The Divination Ceremony's failure...

66.「これら 全てのことさ。| 私は 一連の事件が ひとつの意思のもとに| 引き起こ: All of this. I have discovered that a series|of events have been brought together with a|single intention.

67.「まるで 別々の出来事にしか 思えないな。| <cs_pchero>が 魂の燭台: Seems like two separate events to me. That|<cs_pchero> lost the Soul Candle is not even|an incident, just an accident, right?

68.「いいや そうではない。| <cs_pchero>は 犯人に 襲われたんだよ。|: No, it's not. <cs_pchero> was attacked by|the killer. As a result, he lost his Soul|Candle.

69.「そんな……本当だとしたら 許せません！| ですが 犯人は なぜ そんなことを？: If that's true, it's unforgivable! But why|would the murderer do such a thing?

70.「襲撃の理由は……| 今 キミたちが持っている 悪神の火種にある。: The reason for the attack... is the Fiend's|Flame you now carry.

71.「５人の英雄から 回収された ５つの火種。| つまり 英雄を悪神に 変えるには|: Five sparks recovered from five heroes. So it|takes one Fiend's Flame per hero to turn a|hero into a fiend.

72.「悪神の火種を 神化の光炉に 仕込んだ犯人は| あらかじめ 用意していたはずだよ: Whoever planted Fiend's Flame in the Fiery|Furnace of Divinity had to have prepared it in|advance. The sparks for nine people.

73.「９人？| いえ 天星郷に招かれた 英雄は| 全部で １０人…………: Nine? No, there are ten heroes in all invited|to Heaven...

74.「もしや……<cs_pchero>？ じつは あなたを| 招くべきという 私の訴: What if...<cs_pchero>? As a matter of fact,|my plea to invite you was granted just before|the Four Heavenly Trials began!

75.「本来ならば 生者を 天星郷に迎えることは| ありません。<cs_pchero>:
Normally, we would not welcome the living to|Heaven. Despite the achievements of the|, there are many of our|
|countrymen who oppose...

76.「だが ユーライザの熱意によって| <cs_pchero>は 英雄に選ばれること: But Yuliza's enthusiasm led to <cs_pchero>|being chosen as the hero... and his presence|was a miscalculation for the killer.

77.「犯人が用意していた 悪神の火種は ９つ。| だから 犯人は キミを排除しようと:
The killer had nine Fiend's Flames ready.|That's why he wanted to eliminate you. And the|means to do that goes beyond physical|
|assault...

78.「しかし キミは 危機も悪評も 乗り越えて| 試練の継続を 天使長にも認められた:
But you, after all the danger and notoriety,|were approved by the Archangel to continue the|trials. Hence, the killer decided to change|
|his strategy.

79.「つまり……キミ用の 悪神の火種を| 用意することにしたのさ。神化の儀までにね。: In other words, I've decided to prepare|Fiend's Flame for you. Before the apotheosis.|I needed time to do that.

80.「深翠の試練で 細工をほどこし| 試練を妨害したり……: The Midori trial, where they can sabotage the|trial with their elaborate...

81.「みそぎをおこなう 浄罪の泉を けがすため| 魔物を 差し向けた。これらは 悪神:
They sent monsters to purge the Pure Spring|where they performed the razor rituals. All of|this was to buy time for the Fiend's Flame to|
|make new ones.

82.「あなたの推理が 正しいとして……| 犯人は どうやって| 悪神の火種を作ったと: Assuming your theory is correct... how would|you say the killer created the Fiend's Flame?

83.「キミたちは 見たはずだ。| 神代の遺構にある 廃屋の中で 咲き乱れる| 謎の植: You must have seen it. Mysterious plants|blooming in deserted houses in Ancient|Remains.

84.「悪神の火種……種とは よく言ったものだ。| あの植物の種子こそ 私たちが| 悪: Fiend's Flame...seeds, as they say. The seeds|of that plant are what we call Fiend's Flame.

85.「では あの場所で 死んでいたという| アルビデが 悪神化を仕組んだのか！| い:
So Albide, who was said to have died in that|place, is the one who orchestrated the|apocalypse! How in the world did he commit|
|such a mortal sin?

87.「あの場所に 足しげく通っていたらしい| アルビデは 悪神の火種を育てた| 張本: Albide, who seems to have frequented that|place, is probably the one who fostered the|Fiend's Flame.

88.「だが 神化の儀をおこなう| 天の聖壇は 厳重に管理されている。| 彼の立場では:
But the Heaven Altar, where the Divination|Ceremony is performed, is a closely guarded|place. In his position, he wouldn't have been|
|allowed in.

89.「アルビデの命を糧として 悪神の火種を育てさせ| 用済みとなった彼を見捨てて 種:
The real culprit...is another who used|Albide's life as sustenance to grow the|Fiend's Flame, abandoned him when he was no|
|longer needed, plucked the seed and planted it|in the Divine Light Furnace.

90.「なんと むごいことを……！ フォステイル！| その大罪人の名を 教えてください: What a terrible thing to do! Fostail! Tell me|the name of the great sinner! You already know|the name, don't you?

91.「……その人物は 神化の儀の場でも| 不自然な発言をしていた。: ...the person was also making unnatural|remarks at the deification ceremony.

92.「ただちに <cs_pchero>に| 神化の儀をおこない 神となさしめましょう: Let <cs_pchero> be deified and made a god|immediately. Then let them go forth to defeat|the fiends.

93.「……あれは 自分が 仕掛けておいた| 悪神の火種によって <cs_pchero: ...It was a proposal to make <cs_pchero> a|fiend as well, by means of the Fiend's Flame|he had planted.

94.「一連の事件の 犯人は……あなただろう？| ヘルヴェル。: The culprit in this series of events... is|you, isn't it? Helvel.

96.「ヘ…ヘルヴェルお姉様が アルビデを殺し……| 悪神化を仕組んだ 犯人？: He...is Sister Helvel the one who killed|Albide...and orchestrated his demonic|transformation?

97.「あっ ありえません！ だって……！| だって お姉様は そんな方じゃない！|: Oh, no, that's impossible! Because...! Because|you're not like that! Don't be ridiculous!

98.「神化の儀での発言だって アストルティアへ| 向かった 悪神を 放っておけないと: Even his statement at the deification ceremony|was based on his sense of duty to leave the|fiends headed for Astoltia alone!

100.「公私は わきまえよ。| ……そう 教えたはずだ。: You know the difference between public and|private. I taught you that.

102.「悪神の火種の 回収任務……ご苦労だったな。| たしかに 受け取ったぞ！: Thank you for your efforts in retrieving|Fiend's Flame. Yes, I got it!

103.「回収してきた 悪神の火種が暴発し| <cs_pchero>も 悪神と化した。…: The Fiend's Flame we retrieved went off and|turned <cs_pchero> into a Fiend too. That's|what I was going to tell the Archangel.

104.「つくづく 貴様には 予定を狂わされる……。| しかし それも ここまでだ。: You are really throwing me off schedule... but|that's as far as I'll go.

106.<center>ナニが 英雄。ナニが 神。|コのチカラの前でハ 赤子に等シイ。: What is hero. What is God? In front of his|power, you are no better than a baby.

107.<center>きサまらに 憤怒を。悔恨を。絶望を。|憎悪の炎デ 身もココロも: Let Kisamara be angry. Regret. Despair. Hatred|Fire will burn your body and soul.

109.「そんな未来は 私たちが 実現させない。| ……そうだろう？ <cs_pcher: We will not let that future happen. ...aren't|we? <cs_pchero>.

110.「……さすがに 悪神の火種を| ５つも 取り込んだだけのことはある。| かくも: As one would expect from someone who has taken|in five Fiend's Flame. How can he radiate such|an illicit atmosphere?

111.<center>なゼ あラがう。なゼ 逆ラウ。|あノ圧倒的なチカラの前でハ きサ: Naze aragau. Naze, reverse Lau. Your existence|is futile in the face of the overwhelming|power of the A. Meaningless. Worthless.

115.「審判の天使たちよ！| ヘルヴェルを 抑えるぞ！: Angels of Judgement! We will restrain Helvel!

119.「呪力を使い果たして 砕けたか。: You ran out of spell power and you're|shattered.

120.「ヘルヴェル……お前が犯人だと| フォステイルから 聞かされたときは| 何かの間: Helvel... when Fostail told me it was you, I|thought there must be some mistake...

121.「私は 天使長と 密かに 結託していたのさ。| 神化の儀を失敗させるなんて 芸当: I was secretly in cahoots with the Archangel.|Only an angel could have botched the|apotheosis...

122.「誰が裏切り者かを 調べる役目は| 私が最適だろうと 協力を申しでたんだよ。|:
I thought I would be the best person to|investigate who the traitor was, so I offered|to help. All the angels are suspects, so to|
|speak.

123.「それにしても ヘルヴェルとは……。| この子には 期待していたのだが。: But still, Helvel... I had high hopes for this|girl.

124.「ヘルヴェルの身柄は 我々が押さえておく。| ケガを負ったユーライザは 神都に連: We will take custody of Helvel. We will take|the injured Yuliza back to the capital for|treatment.

125.「なぜ こんな事を しでかしたのか……| 早急に ヘルヴェルを問いただしたいが|:
I'd like to question Helvel as soon as|possible about why he did this, but from the|looks of him, I don't think he'll wake up for|
|a while.

126.「残りの悪神たち……初代勇者アシュレイと| 盟友レオーネの消息も いまだ不明のま: The rest of the fiends...the first Hero,|Ashley, and his ally, Leone, are still|missing. It's all a bit of a headache.

127.「だが ５人の英雄を連れもどし| 裏切者の正体まで 突き止めた。| 事態の収束へ: But you brought back five heroes and even|identified the traitor. That's a big step|forward in getting things back on track.

128.「お前の功績を 讃えさせてくれ。| さあ これを……。: Let me give you credit for that. Now, here...

129.「本当に 世話になったな <cs_pchero>。| それに フォステイル………: You really took care of me <cs_pchero>. And|Fostail... hmm? Where's Fostail?

130.「……神出鬼没な やつめ。まあ いい。| 私たちは 引き上げさせてもらうよ。: He's a wanderer. Well, that's all right. We'll|leave you to it.

131.「俺らを 上から見下ろす 天使様のくせに| あっさり やられちまいやがって……。: You're the angel looking down on us from|above, and you got beat up so easily... what a|bunch of slackers.

132.「けど まあ……こっちの準備が| ととのったのは あんたのおかげだ。| ありがと: But, well... it's thanks to you that we're all|ready to go. Thank you, Mr. Helvel.

135.「神都フォーリオンの下層 礼拝堂の北にある| ヘルヴェルお姉様の ご自宅。その２:
Sister Helvel's home, north of the Lower|chapel in the Celestial City Fourion. My room|is on the 2F of the house...please take care|
|of it.

136.「<cs_pchero>が 天星郷に到着した直後に| 魂の燭台を 紛失したこと。:
The loss of the Soul Candle shortly after| arrived in Heaven. The God|Beast's transformation that took place in the|
|Deep Green Trials.

137.「いいや そうではない。| <cs_pchero>は 犯人に 襲われたんだよ。|: No, it's not. <cs_pchero> was attacked by|the killer. As a result, he lost his Soul|Candle.

138.「天使の間に広がる 悪意に満ちたウワサ……| あれも キミの 四天の星巡りを妨害: The malicious rumors spreading among the Sky|Room... they must have been intentionally|spread to sabotage your Four Heavenly Trials.
